# Roleplay Rule 4 - Do not powergame
Powergaming is defined as "collecting items that give you an advantage without IC reason"
## Examples
### [bold] Permitted [/bold]
- Collecting medical supplies when wounded or when going into dangerous situations. - Accepting items or offers that are given to you. - Collecting items you need for your job. - Collecting anything you want as antagonist.
### [bold] Not Permitted [/bold]
- Preparing for antagonists that you do not know about. - Preparing for antagonists that pose you no threat. - Preparing for situations you dont know will happen IC. - Preparing weapons or armor for no IC reason.
